Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Circle, Fireball, Flash, Sphere, Star-like, Other, Unknown
divs: sighting detailsriding my bike down curvy road (miller store road) next to norfolk airport about 2am ,norfolk,virginia; saw a flash of light shoot straight up into the sky, similar to a "shooting star" but heading straight up. object seemed to disappear and reappear (maybe behind dark clouds?), but maintained a straight path up. when it reached a certain distance it started to arch downward, but was propelled back up with something like a boost that let off spark-like emissions. maybe fuel burning like rocket fuel? after that it continued into the dark cloudy sky until out of sight. made my eyes water for doubting ufo abductees and people who claim to have seen\encountered ufo\extraterrestrial phenonemon sp?
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Norfolk
There were no other sightings in Norfolk on or around March 16th 2013
Summary: Riding my bike down curvy road next to norfolk airport about 2AM; saw a flash of light shoot straight up in the sky similar to a "shooting star" but heading straight up
